Question
========
Where do you update the website title and repository URL for a Quarto site?

Answerlist
----------
* In the README.md file only
* In a file named aboutme.qmd
* In styles.css
* In the _quarto.yml configuration file

Solution
========
The site title and repository URL are configured in _quarto.yml.

Answerlist
----------
* False
* False
* False
* True
